title: Ayaz Sadiq wishes speedy recovery for former US President Donald Trump
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 14 (APP):Speaker of the National Assembly Ayaz Sadiq expressed his wishes for the speedy recovery of former US President Donald Trump on Sunday.
He conveyed deep sorrow upon learning about the attack on Trump during an election rally, said a news release.
“The attack is against democratic values and traditions,” he said
He said that Pakistan has always condemned terrorism in all forms and manifestations
Ayaz Sadiq also extended his best wishes for the recovery of others injured in the attack.
